title: Carcassonne
summary: Carcassonne (/ˌkɑːrkəˈsɒn/,[2][3] also US: /-ˈsɔːn, -ˈsoʊn/,[4] French: [kaʁkasɔn] (listen), locally [kaʁkasɔnə]; Occitan: Carcassona [kaɾkaˈsunɔ]; Latin: Carcaso) is a French fortified city in the department of Aude, in the region of Occitanie. It is the  prefecture of the department.
